mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_USERNAME, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_TEL, MEM_REGION1, MEM_REGION2, MEM_AUTHORITY, MEM_REGDATE, MEM_IMAGE, MEM_GENDER, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTHDAY, MEM_LATEST, ISDELETE, REPORT_ID, NVL(ART_COUNT, 0) AS ART_COUNT, NVL(REP_COUNT, 0) AS REP_COUNT, NVL(HIS_GOOD, 0) AS HIS_GOOD, NVL(HIS_NORMAL, 0) AS HIS_NORMAL, NVL(HIS_BAD, 0) AS HIS_BAD FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(*) ART_COUNT FROM ARTICLE GROUP BY MEM_ID) A USING(MEM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(*) REP_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY MEM_ID) R USING(MEM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MEM_ID, SUM(HIS_GOOD) HIS_GOOD, SUM(HIS_NORMAL) HIS_NORMAL, SUM(HIS_BAD) HIS_BAD FROM TRADE T NATURAL JOIN (SELECT TRD_ID, COUNT(CASE WHEN HIS_SCORE = 1 THEN 1 END) HIS_GOOD, COUNT(CASE WHEN HIS_SCORE = 0 THEN 1 END) HIS_NORMAL, COUNT(CASE WHEN HIS_SCORE = -1 THEN 1 END) HIS_BAD FROM HISTORY GROUP BY TRD_ID) GROUP BY MEM_ID) H USING(MEM_ID)) WHERE MEM_USERNAME = #{username}
